evidence.claim: Integrated Medicine USA utilizes AWS for backend services.
The platform supports FHIR standards for health data exchange.
Compliance with HIPAA regulations is maintained through secure data handling practices.
Uses Kafka for real-time patient data streaming.
HL7 protocols are integrated for interoperability with EHR systems.

icp.icp_reason: No specific evidence found for X12/EDI use cases on the company's website.
